attributes.action: More help and support for those who have served in the forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: EVERYDAY FORMER SOLDIERS STRUGGLE WITH EVERYDAY LIFE.WHEN THEY LEAVE THE ARMED FORCES. THEY SUFFER FROM DEPRESSION OTHERS FACE HOMELESSNESS CAUSE THEY CANT AFFORD TO WORK. MR BROWN I FEEL THE TIME IS NOW FOR THESE SOLDIERS WHO HAVE SERVED TO GET BETTER SUPPORT AND TREATMENT THEY DESERVE!! THEY ARE NOT A NUMBER THEY HAVE FAMILIES AND FRIENDS WHO STRUGGLE TO HELP THEM WITH EVERDAY TASKS. PLEASE GET THE SUPPORT AND THE TREATMENT AND THE BENEFITS THEY DESERVE!! DONT TREAT THEM LIKE A NUMBER TREAT LIKE A HUMAN BEING THEY FIGHT FOR THIS COUNTRY AND DESERVE TO BE TREATED WITH RESPECT AND SUPPORT THEY SO TRUELLY DESERVE

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
